[brynhild.plugins]
test-complete = brynhild_test_complete:register

[brynhild.tools]
TestEcho = brynhild_test_complete.tools:EchoTool
TestCounter = brynhild_test_complete.tools:CounterTool

[brynhild.providers]
test-mock = brynhild_test_complete.providers:MockProvider

[brynhild.hooks]
test-hooks = brynhild_test_complete.hooks:get_hooks

[brynhild.skills]
test-skill = brynhild_test_complete.skills:get_skill

[brynhild.commands]
test-cmd = brynhild_test_complete.commands:get_command

[brynhild.rules]
test-rules = brynhild_test_complete.rules:get_rules
